title: NO cooking gas until Monday (30) – Litro
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas urged the general public NOT to wait in line for LP Gas cylinders as the distribution will NOT take place until next week.
Litro said that payments were made for 7,000 MT of LP Gas, however there is a delay in the shipment.
The shipment is expected to reach Sri Lanka on Monday (30), said Litro adding that the distribution will commence on Tuesday (31) or in June.
